sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Près d'Antakya, dans le sud de la Turquie, des bulldozers creusent des fosses pour y installer un cimetière de fortune.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Un peu moins d'une semaine après le puissant séisme qui a fait au total plus de 28 000 morts, les habitants s'organisent avec les moyens du bord pour rendre un dernier hommage aux victimes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Plus de 2000 personnes ont déjà été enterrées ici En Syrie, plus de 5 millions de personnes se sont retrouvées sans abri depuis le tremblement de terre selon les Nations Unies L'accès à l'aide internationale est rendu compliqué par près de 12 ans de guerre civile et par les sanctions infligées au régime de Bachar al-Assad.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Comme en Turquie, les recherches pour trouver des survivants dans les décombres se poursuivent. You've got to be on your own. It's too much. The perilous mission of search and rescue teams through the rubble in Antakya feels endless.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A Turkish squad agreed to take us along during one such operation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Since the 7.8 magnitude earthquake hit the region on Monday, it's been all hands on deck.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Many involved in shoveling and sifting through the rubble for survivors are volunteers with no previous experience.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But that's not keeping them from carrying on.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Here, where a five-storey building once stood, the only things left are debris and hope, against all odds. What's happening here is nothing short of extraordinary.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Some four hours ago, the rescue team started hearing noises.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: They asked everyone around here in the streets to be quiet, the engines of cars and diggers to be turned off.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: They were communicating with someone under the rubble and now that person is set to finally come out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: More teams and equipment were brought in and even family members were called to try and guide rescuers through the building plan to speed up the process.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: plan to speed up the process.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Moments later, at a crucial stage for this particular rescue, a sudden cry about the collapse of a dam and chaos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Rescuers run through the rubble. Searches are suspended until the news that it was a false alert.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Turkish officials accuse looters of attempting to spread fake information, wasting precious hours of life-saving work.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: What happened?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I don't know.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: They said that just now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Apparently it's water.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But eventually rescuers returned and families followed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: I still have my hope because I am still alive. But the miracle that many hoped for wasn't meant to happen tonight.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And the pain that is already immense grew just a little larger.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: As if the wave of hurt and destruction submerging this country didn't want to recede.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Anneliese Borges in Antakya Turquie, pour ce samedi. Dans la soirée, le président ukrainien a également limogé un haut responsable militaire,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: le commandant adjoint de la garde nationale, Ruslan Dziuba.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Dans son allocution quotidienne, Volodymyr Zelensky a dit poursuivre sa campagne de nettoyage du gouvernement après plusieurs scandales de corruption.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Et ce, dans le but de se rapprocher d'une adhésion à l'Union européenne.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: En attendant, les combats continuent de faire rage dans l'est de l'Ukraine. Comme ici, à Voulédar, une petite ville minière dont la prise offrirait aux Russes un avantage tactique dans la bataille du Donbass.
